title: Reactivating an account I deactivated
body: Hi, I deactivated my account about a year ago and wanted to reactivate it but couldn't find out how to go about doing so

replies.body: If you deactivated (_not deleted_) your account, you can always have it reactivated by reaching out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Let our support agents know that you just need to be reactivated, and you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
How can you reactivate when you don't have access to the account??
